  135. #if (__FreeBSD__) && (__FreeBSD_version < 400017)

  137. #include <sys/param.h>          /* ALIGN() */

  139. /*
  140. * FreeBSD 3.x has no CMSG_SPACE() and CMSG_LEN() and has the broken CMSG_DATA()
  141. */

  143. ‌#undef  CMSG_SPACE
  144. ‌#define CMSG_SPACE(l)       (ALIGN(sizeof(struct cmsghdr)) + ALIGN(l))

  146. ‌#undef  CMSG_LEN
  147. ‌#define CMSG_LEN(l)         (ALIGN(sizeof(struct cmsghdr)) + (l))

  149. ‌#undef  CMSG_DATA
  150. ‌#define CMSG_DATA(cmsg)     ((u_char *)(cmsg) + ALIGN(sizeof(struct cmsghdr)))

  152. #endif


  155. extern char **environ;
